    • Constructor Detail

      • Hex

        public Hex(java.awt.Point northWest,
           int radius,
           Piece pieceColour,
           Coordinate coords)
        Creates a hex object, intialising the hexPoly field
        Parameters:
        northWest - The point which represents the top left corner of the bounding rectangle of the hexagon
        radius - The radius of the hexagon (outer circle)
        pieceColour - The colour of the hex in terms of Piece enumerations
        coords - The coordinates of this hexagon on the board

    • Method Detail

      • select

        public boolean select()
        Selects this hex if it is Piece.UNSET
        Returns:
        boolean indicating success

        Updates the colour of the hex
        Parameters:
        pieceColour - The new value of the colour of the hex

        Returns:
        The coordinates of the hex on a board

      • getColor

        public java.awt.Color getColor()
                        throws InvalidColourException
        Returns:
        color for the panel to draw the hex in
        Throws:
        InvalidColourException - The Piece colour is not one that can be translated into a display colour.

      • getBelowHexPoint

        public java.awt.Point getBelowHexPoint()
        Returns:
        The top left point of the bounding box of a hex that is drawn below this one

      • getRightHexPoint

        public java.awt.Point getRightHexPoint()
        Returns:
        The top left point of the bounding box of a hex that is drawn to the right of this one

      • clicked

        public boolean clicked(java.awt.Point point)
        Determines whether a click at a certain point constitutes clicking this hex
        Parameters:
        point - The position that was clicked
        Returns:
        boolean indicated whether this hex was clicked

      • calculatePoints

        public java.awt.Polygon calculatePoints(java.awt.Point northWest,
                                        int radius)
        Create the hex polygon
        Parameters:
        northWest - The top left point of the bounding box of the hex to be drawn
        radius - The radius of the outer circle of the hexagon - i.e. the distance from the origin to any point
        Returns:
        the hex polygon that was created
